epic: ProcureSight+ Integration into Appian Core Solutions

stories.story_name: Refactor ProcureSight Site Tab Search Functionality
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: User is on the ProcureSight Site tab **WHEN**: User enters search terms and clicks search **THEN**: Results are displayed using the new ProcureSight+ Module backend API with procurement results and expanded filter set

stories.story_name: Enable Add to Collection and Save to Requirement Actions
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: User views procurement search results **WHEN**: User clicks 'Add to Collection' or 'Save to Requirement' **THEN**: The procurement is saved to the selected collection or requirement with confirmation
**GIVEN**: User views search results **WHEN**: User clicks on a result card **THEN**: Procurement Summary displays with all data and links to Vendor Summary and Codes Summary

stories.story_name: Enable Native AI Document Chat Integration
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: User is viewing procurement documents **WHEN**: User clicks on a document **THEN**: Native AI Chat interface opens allowing user to chat with the document
**GIVEN**: User accesses Requirement Summary **WHEN**: User navigates to the insights area **THEN**: Tabs are reorganized as Research, Bookmarks, Search, Documents, and Best in Class

stories.story_name: Implement Search Tab with Global Search Interface
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: User is on the new Search tab **WHEN**: User performs a search **THEN**: Global search page displays with recent searches and results using ProcureSight+ Module

stories.story_name: Create Bookmarks Tab for Saved Procurements
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: User has saved procurements to requirement **WHEN**: User clicks Bookmarks tab **THEN**: All saved procurements display with ability to view details and remove items
**GIVEN**: User accesses Collections **WHEN**: User views the collections page **THEN**: Updated UX displays per mockup specifications with improved navigation

stories.story_name: Implement Collection Summary with Three Tabs
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: User opens a collection **WHEN**: User views collection summary **THEN**: Three tabs display: Bookmarks, Documents, and Insights with respective content
**GIVEN**: New ProcureSight+ Module is integrated **WHEN**: Development removes old integration **THEN**: All existing PS integration code is removed without breaking functionality
